mapper.insert: INSERT INTO foster_service (user_id, name, service_desc,family_desc, img_urls, address, lat, lon, province, city, district, max_pet_count, house_space, house_type, walk_place, walk_duration, accept_pet_type, service_pet_type, foster_type, house_plant, self_provide, foster_limit, is_open) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{name}, #{service_desc}, #{family_desc}, #{img_urls}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{max_pet_count}, #{house_space}, #{house_type}, #{walk_place},#{walk_duration}, #{accept_pet_type}, #{service_pet_type}, #{foster_type}, #{house_plant}, #{self_provide}, #{foster_limit}, #{is_open})
mapper.select: SELECT foster_service.*, user.name AS user_name, user.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, user.age AS user_age, user.gender AS user_gender, user.phone AS user_phone, user.email AS user_email, user.regist_at AS user_regist_at FROM foster_service LEFT JOIN app_user AS user ON user.user_id = foster_service.user_id WHERE foster_service.id = #{id}
